support.title: Support
support.phoneHours: Saturday to Thursday, 9 AM to 6 PM

faq1.question: What is FunZone Host?
faq1.answer: A smart panel for cafes and businesses that want to host events, fill their capacity, and increase their sales.

faq2.question: How can I become a FunZone host?
faq2.answer: Simply register, upload your cafe details and required documents; after approval, your management panel will be activated.

faq3.question: How much does membership cost?
faq3.answer: Currently, initial membership is free, only a small commission percentage is charged from each successful reservation.

faq4.question: How can I set the time and capacity of events?
faq4.answer: From the 'Event Management' section, you can enter the date, time, capacity, price, and specific rules for each event.

faq5.question: When and how are reservation payments deposited?
faq5.answer: After each event ends and final confirmation, reservation amounts are deposited to your registered bank account.

faq6.question: What happens if a user cancels a reservation?
faq6.answer: Cancellation is done according to the conditions you set; the system calculates the amount based on those rules.

faq8.question: How can I see user feedback?
faq8.answer: In the management panel, there is a 'Comments and Ratings' section where you can view feedback and respond to them.

faq9.question: If the cafe capacity is full, are new reservations closed?
faq9.answer: Yes, the system automatically controls capacities to prevent over-booking.

faq10.question: Does FunZone have support?
faq10.answer: Absolutely! Host support is active 7 days a week and is always responsive through in-app chat or phone call.
